responses.NoMacroPermission: You are not allowed to use script macros.
responses.NoRunAsGM: You are not authorized to run this macro as the GM.
responses.SyntaxError: There was an error in your chat message syntax.
responses.MacroSyntaxError: There was an error in your macro syntax. See the console (F12) for details.
responses.ExternalMacroSyntaxError: There was an error in your macro syntax. See the console (F12) of the GM {GM} for details.
responses.TimeoutGM: Timed out waiting to elect a GM to execute the macro.
responses.TimeoutWaitGM: Timed out waiting for the GM to execute the macro.
responses.NoConnectedGM: There are no connected GMs to run the macro {macro} in the GM context.

MACROS.runAsGMTooltip:
This will cause the macro to be executed by the GM when players execute it.
For security reasons, only applies to GM-created macros with no other owners.
MACROS.runForEveryoneTooltip:
This will cause the macro to be executed by the GM for every players connected.
For security reasons, only applies to GM-created macros with no other owners.
MACROS.runForSpecificUserTooltip:
This will cause the macro to be executed by the GM for a specific player connected.
For security reasons, only applies to GM-created macros with no other owners.
MACROS.runAsWorldScriptTooltip: Allow you to write a script in game which executes as if it was a world script.

disableDropHotbarRollTableBehavior.name: Disable Drop RollTable On Hotbar
disableDropHotbarRollTableBehavior.hint: The function of creating a macro on the hotbar when dropping a Rolltable may conflict with other modules. This setting disables this functionality.

legacySlashCommand.name: (Experimental) Legacy Slash Command
legacySlashCommand.hint: Ignores the need to use the /amacro command to call macros on the chat. Warning: this might cause conflict with your system or other modules.
